text: UTC stands for "Universal Time Coordinated", and is the world-wide standard for tracking time-zones. Every time zone is relative to UTC. Before 1972, this was known as "GMT", or "Greenwich Mean Time".
My birthday was March 13, 1414. That means it's been {daysSinceBirthday} days, or about {yearsSinceBirthday} years since!
Today is the {daysYear}{dateSuffix} day of the year.
